metadata.title: CVE-2016-6252 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Integer overflow in shadow 4.2.1 allows local users to gain privileges viacrafted input to newuidmap.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6252` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

login - 1:4.2-3.1ubuntu5.2
passwd - 1:4.2-3.1ubuntu5.2
uidmap - 1:4.2-3.1ubuntu5.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: shadow package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:4.2-3.1ubuntu5.2').
